fields.label: Start Date
fields.name: campaign_start_date
fields.instructions: Marks the beginning of the campaign.

fields.label: End Date
fields.name: campaign_end_date
fields.instructions: Marks the end of the campaign, when all the elements are removed from the website.

fields.label: Countdown Start Date
fields.name: campaign_countdown_start_date
fields.instructions:
Marks the date and time when the content of the field 'Desktop Content With Countdown' takes the place of the content of the field 'Desktop Content'. 
Important: The countdown timer only shows up to 2 digits for days. Days above 99 will be cut off.

fields.label: Promo Banner Include/Exclude Criteria
fields.name: campaign_promo_banner_include_exclude_criteria
fields.instructions: Defines how the list of pages below will be treated.

fields.label: Promo Banner Included/Excluded Pages
fields.name: campaign_promo_banner_excluded_pages
fields.instructions: A newline-separated list of paths (one per line is allowed). Example: /for-freelancers

fields.label: Mobile Content
fields.name: campaign_promo_banner_mobile_content
fields.instructions: Add the text and CTA for the mobile content.

fields.label: Desktop Content
fields.name: campaign_promo_banner_desktop_content
fields.instructions: Add the text and CTA for the desktop content.

fields.label: Desktop Content With Countdown
fields.name: campaign_promo_banner_desktop_content_countdown
fields.instructions: Use dynamic tags for the portions of the text that will be replaced. Example: Only <replace-data>countdown</replace-data> left to get 60% off for <replace-data>optimizely</replace-data> months

fields.label: CTA
fields.name: campaign_promo_banner_cta
fields.instructions: The CTA for the countdown version of the text only.

fields.label: Background Colour
fields.name: campaign_promo_banner_background_colour
fields.instructions: Background Colour of the promo banner.

fields.label: Text Colour
fields.name: campaign_promo_banner_text_colour
fields.instructions: Text Colour of the promo banner.

fields.label: Slide-In Notification Include/Exclude Criteria
fields.name: campaign_slide_in_include_exclude_criteria
fields.instructions: Defines how the list of pages below will be treated.

fields.label: Slide-In Notification Included/Excluded Pages
fields.name: campaign_slide_in_excluded_pages
fields.instructions: A newline-separated list of paths (one per line is allowed). Example: /for-freelancers
